# Prepare sync proposal for PO

Execute the **sync-proposal** workflow as a **Functional Analyst**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_FA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_FA.md)

## Workflow

Prepare sync proposal for PO:
1. List all completed Feature-Increments
2. Document changes to Product Canon
3. Verify all DoD criteria met
4. Create sync proposal document


## Output

Sync proposal document
